titleStmt.title: Northern Bank of Kentucky. Glasgow Branch

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Northern Bank of Kentucky. Glasgow Branch

body.p: Glasgow, Kentucky branch of the Northern Bank of Kentucky. Chartered by the Kentucky legislature, June 1, 1859. Thomas C. Dickinson appointed a Director in the Glasgow Branch of the Northern Bank of Kentucky upon its establishment and held the position until the branch was discontinued in c1876.

bibl.p: The Biographical Encyclopaedia of Kentucky of the Dead and Living Men of the Nineteenth Century (Cincinnati, OH: J.M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 390-91.

Stanton, Richard H., The Revised Statutes of Kentucky, Approved and Adopted by the General Assembly, 1851 and 1852, and in Force From July 1, 1852; with all the Amendments Subsequently Enacted. Volume II (Cincinnati, OH: Robert Clarke & Co, 1867), 500.
